channel.title: Cruise TV with LoveitBookit
channel.desc: Your one-stop-shop for all things cruise; bringing you the hottest destinations, ground-breaking ships and the latest deals! Call 0800 090 3393 or visit us at www.loveitbookit.com/tv.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Lee are in Aylesbury to create a Thai-inspired garden for Justin and Linda, with a relaxing space for remembrance.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Richard Wilson's Highland Fling
channel.desc: Richard returns to Scotland to embark on tour of the Highlands and Islands. The journey offers him the opportunity to discover more about his homeland and reflect on his life.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Hello Campers
channel.desc: Relive the glory days of good clean Hi-De-Hi style fun with this oral history of Britain's holiday camps. Hello Campers.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: What's Good For The Goose
channel.desc: Comedy. Norman Wisdom stars as a bank manager who upends his square existence to join some youthful hippies. Will this new groovy energy bring the spark back to his marriage.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Buster
channel.desc: Comedy. The story of Great Train Robber Buster Edwards, a small-timer who fell in with more ambitious thieves. Phil Collins and Julie Walters star.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Stick Up
channel.desc: In this period caper, set in 1930s England, romance blooms between two very different people, an American thief and an Irish woman.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Futtock's End
channel.desc: Ronnie Barker stars as General Futtock, who has a motley group of guests stay at his country estate - and chaos ensues. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Me and My Affair
channel.desc: Stories of people who have experienced infidelity, the reasons why people stray outside their relationship and if a relationship can ever survive.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Sex With The Stars
channel.desc: A shy astrology columnist is ordered to spice up his column by having affairs with a woman from each star sign then writing about it. Contains sex scenes and 80s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Sex Thief
channel.desc: Riotous early 70s comedy in which an audacious cat burglar steals more than his female victims' jewellery. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Chris are in Devizes to design a Mediterranean garden for Darrel and Michelle, inspired by childhood memories of time spent in Cyprus.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Love Your Home and Garden
channel.desc: Alan Titchmarsh and his team of experts transform both the house and the garden in Eltham for the family of a young boy with dystonic quadriplegic cerebral palsy.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: It's June, and the team heads up to Dartmoor to discover the ways in which Edwardian farmers took advantage of this unique and spectacular landscape to add to their income.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Stuart Farm
channel.desc: 11 / 12. Archaeologists and historians run a farm for a year as it would have been in the reign of King James I. It's July and the team has to get into the meadow and start making hay.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Reel Stories
channel.desc: Cinema projectionists make magic with light. As digital projection makes them obsolete, this film records the working lives of projectionists in the heyday of this dying art.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Flipping Profit
channel.desc: An antiques expert, a market trader and an upcycler compete to make the most money. Mark Stacey, Tony Wong and Zoe Pocock visit Exeter.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: LumoTV
channel.desc: Can you recognise these characters from 'Four Deaf Yorkshire Men' and 'Coffee Morning Club'? Can they work together to play the games and win ?1,000 for their chosen charity? Who are you rooting for.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Boatyards On the Thames
channel.desc: An oral history of Boatyards on the tidal Thames as told by boat builders and boatyard owners. Produced by Digital Works.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Bread
channel.desc: Seventies drama. Returning home from the Isle of Wight Pop Festival, a free-spirited group of guys and girls clash with the landowner where they pitch camp. Contains nudity.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Can You Keep It Up For A Week?
channel.desc: Comedy. Annette will marry Gil, her hapless boyfriend, on the condition he keeps his new job for a week without getting up to mischief with other women. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Black Beauty
channel.desc: Faithful version of classic children's tale featuring the adventures of spirited horse Black Beauty. Can her young owner get her back? Mark Lester - of Oliver! fame - stars.

channel.title: Love Your Home and Garden
channel.desc: Alan is in Chester to meet retirees Richard and Ann, who have been married for 34 years.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: It is July and the team face their busiest month so far. Historian Ruth Goodman tries her hand at salmon netting, and there is a rare opportunity for a day away from the farm.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Stuart Farm
channel.desc: 12 / 12. Archaeologists and historians run a farm for a year as it would have been in the reign of King James I. August marks the final month and the main task is the wheat harvest. Last in series.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: D Day - Hour by Hour
channel.desc: On the 80th anniversary of D-Day, a turning point of World War II, extraordinary archive materials reveal contrasting stories from the Allied Normandy beach landings of 6 June 1944.

channel.title: Flipping Profit
channel.desc: An antiques expert, a market trader and an upcycler compete to make the most money. Philip Serrell, Melissa Downhill and Micaela Sharp head to Hay-on-Wye.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Die Screaming Marianne
channel.desc: Marianne, a nightclub dancer, is on the run from vicious criminals. Trickery and betrayal are around every corner in this suspense-filled thriller. Susan George stars.

channel.title: Black Jack

channel.desc: August brings the climax of the farming year, and the end of 12 months on the Edwardian Farm for the team. They must harvest their oat crop, but everything depends on the weather.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Right To Roam
channel.desc: The story of the people who have struggled for the right to roam in England - from the mass trespass on Kinder Scout in 1932 to the great Dartmoor Gathering of 2023.

channel.title: Flipping Profit
channel.desc: An antiques expert, a market trader and an upcycler compete to make the most money. Gavin Claxton, Linda Lambert and Anthony Devine head to Oxford.

channel.title: Designing the Hebrides

channel.title: Highclere
channel.desc: The team prepare for their first charity gala in three years in the castle's iconic library, with some clay pigeon shooting, a three-course lunch and a big-ticket auction.

channel.desc: A young model is lured to a secluded prison where a sadistic matron punishes women for perceived moral failings. Contains nudity and distressing scenes.

channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Chris are in Devizes to transform a tired old plot into a desert garden, reminiscent of Arabia, for John and Vanessa.

channel.title: Love Your Home and Garden
channel.desc: Alan meets Anne and Mike who has dementia. The layout of the house and garden means Mike is finding it difficult to cope and risks never leaving his home.

channel.title: Designing the Hebrides
channel.desc: Banjo and his team get to transform a much-loved family-run fish shop on the Isle of Mull. He has bold ambitions, but can he convince the owners to trust his daring designs.

channel.title: New Home DIY
channel.desc: DIY expert Dave Wellman visits a couple in Southampton, who have an unfinished bathroom and building site for a home. 1/20.

channel.desc: The castle marks the release of the second Downton Abbey film with an interview on the Lorraine breakfast show and a trip to London's Leicester Square for the premiere.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Man Down
channel.desc: Stories from men working in the music industry and the toll it has taken on their mental health and wellbeing. Featuring Rag'n'Bone Man, Dev IDLES and Geoff Barrow from Portishead.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Flipping Profit
channel.desc: An antiques expert, a market trader and an upcycler compete to make the most money. Philip Serrell, Tony Wong and Micaela Sharp head to Stratford-upon-Avon.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Going To The Dogs
channel.desc: The story of Wimbledon Greyhound Stadium which drew crowds of 25,000 in its heyday. After it closed in 2017 just two of London's once-27 greyhound race tracks remain operating.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Designing the Hebrides
channel.desc: Banjo and his team have been tasked with updating a crumbling bothy for the community on the Isle of Ulva. Can Banjo transform it into a cosy, welcoming retreat.

channel.title: Highclere
channel.desc: The team mark the centenary of the 5th Earl of Carnarvon's discovery of Tutankhamen's tomb, and prepare for the biggest event of the summer - the Battle Proms.

channel.desc: Charlie and Chris are in Devizes to transform a tired old plot into a desert garden, reminiscent of Arabia, for John and Vanessa.
